about_the_game:
A daily train commute gone wrong: Speed Limit is one take, non-stop arcade experience that never slows down. An old-school shooter boiled down to its core elements: Hard. Fast. Addictive.

Running. Driving. Flying. Dying (many, many times!) - From the moment you click play to the moment you die, you are in control.

As soon as you think you've learned how the game works, it changes to a completely different genre, taking you through the history of the golden arcade era.

A MUST-HAVE FOR old-school FANS


  • The flagship of the award-winning Gamechuck Arcade finally available on Steam!
  • A thrilling genre-switching rollercoaster that will test the limits of your reflexes
  • Unlockable endless mode, infinite mode, ghost mode
  • No tweening, no skeletons: All graphics are hand-drawn frame-by-frame

content_descriptors.notes: There is cartoonish pixel-art blood and gore.

name: Speed Limit Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any x86 CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / Radeon RX 550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any x86 CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 / Radeon R9 FURY or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
